page.title: 14Trade
page.content: Ellendune shopping centre is situated in the middle of Wroughton. The age of the centre is about 15 years old. They built the shopping centre so that journeys into Swindon became less frequent as more people moved to the village. The centre is a row of terraced shops with housing facilities above. It contains a fruit shop, hair dressser, newsagents, butchers, ladies clothes, optician and supermarket. It is built around two of a car park, making it easy to shop. A questionaire showed that most people use the Ellendune for their basic shopping,but two people bought their bread in Swindon and everyone shopped for large items such as furniture in Swindon.
